synthesis_conditions.description: All the as-synthesized samples were immersed in acetone for 3 days, during which the solvent was decanted and freshly replenished three times a day. All the samples were activated under vacuum at 333 K for 4 hours to obtain activated 1a.
The activated MOF (1 g) was filled into a packed column of ϕ 4.2×80 mm, and then the packed column was washed with Ar at a rate of 7 mL min-1 at 333 K for 35 minutes to further activate the samples.
Between two breakthrough experiments, the adsorbent was regenerated by Ar flow of 7 mL min-1 for 35 min at 333 K to guarantee a complete removal of the adsorbed gases.
